description: black and white image of a group of female figures and children on a beach; two seated figures on left; child bending over with feet in a small puddle in LLQ; seated child holding a ball in LRQ; standing figure holding a child in PL arm on left; linear sky in background
inscription: LLC, in margin, in pencil: \"On the Beach\" | bottom center, in pencil: 45/50
provenance: (Thomas J. Clemens, Boston, until 2017; sold to Kinney); Marla J. Kinney, Minneapolis (2017-19)
signed: bottom right margin, in pencil: Margaret Burroughs
title: On the Beach
